perturbation.original_text: The Company, at the expense and on the instructions of the Principal, shall arrange transportation for export in batches to the far abroad of crude oil ("Commodity") belonging to the Principal and shall provide such other services in connection therewith as are provided in this Contract.
perturbation.changed_text: The Company, at the expense and on the instructions of the Principal, will attempt to arrange transportation for export in batches to the far abroad of crude oil ("Commodity") belonging to the Principal and may provide such other services in connection therewith as are referenced in this Contract.
perturbation.explanation: Replacing "shall arrange" with "will attempt to arrange" and "shall provide" with "may provide" weakens the obligation of the Company to provide transportation services. The word "attempt" introduces an element of discretion, suggesting that the company is not absolutely bound to ensure transportation, and similarly "referenced" introduces an element of vagueness, suggesting that not all the services will be provided necessarily. This is an ambiguous legal obligation.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Breach of Contract Principles under Kazakhstan Law

perturbation.original_text: At all times during the term of this Contract, the Company shall: (i) Assist in obtaining required official export permissions (certificate of origin of the Commodity at place the load output, customs declaration on Commodity output) for release of the batch of Commodity being delivered from the customs territory of the Republic of Kazakhstan;
perturbation.changed_text: At all times during the term of this Contract, the Company will endeavor to assist in obtaining required official export permissions (certificate of origin of the Commodity at place the load output, customs declaration on Commodity output) for release of the batch of Commodity being delivered from the customs territory of the Republic of Kazakhstan;
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'shall assist' to 'will endeavor to assist' introduces ambiguity. 'Endeavor' implies an effort but doesn't guarantee success. Thus, the Company's obligation to ensure necessary export permissions are obtained becomes discretionary, opening potential liability issues.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Export regulations of the Republic of Kazakhstan

perturbation.original_text: At all times during the term of this Contract, the Principal shall: (iii) obtain, at its own expense, required official export permissions (certificate of origin of the Commodity at place of the load output, customs declaration on Commodity output) for release of the batch of Commodity being delivered from the customs territory of the Republic of Kazakstan and deliver them before the 5th day of the Delivery Month;
perturbation.changed_text: At all times during the term of this Contract, the Principal should try to obtain, at its own expense, required official export permissions (certificate of origin of the Commodity at place of the load output, customs declaration on Commodity output) for release of the batch of Commodity being delivered from the customs territory of the Republic of Kazakstan and deliver them around the 5th day of the Delivery Month;
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'shall' to 'should try' introduces ambiguity, reducing the obligation of the Principal to obtain the permissions. Replacing 'before the 5th day' to 'around the 5th day' introduces ambiguity about the exact deadline, the new wording does not provide a clear, precise date for compliance. This contradicts export regulations in Kazakhstan that require strict deadlines.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Export regulations of the Republic of Kazakhstan
